segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a MED-V Workspace

segment.source: All virtual machine setup configuration settings are configured in the Policy module, on the VM Setup tab.
segment.target: All virtual machine setup configuration settings are configured in the Policy module, on the VM Setup tab.

segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a Persistent MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a Persistent MED-V Workspace

segment.source: To configure the virtual machine setup for a persistent MED-V workspace
segment.target: To configure the virtual machine setup for a persistent MED-V workspace

segment.source: Click a persistent MED-V workspace to be configured.
segment.target: Click a persistent MED-V workspace to be configured.

segment.source: In the Persistent VM Setup section, configure the properties as described in the following table.
segment.target: In the Persistent VM Setup section, configure the properties as described in the following table.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The persistent VM setup properties are enabled only for a persistent MED-V workspace.
segment.target: The persistent VM setup properties are enabled only for a persistent MED-V workspace.

segment.source: On the Policy menu, select Commit.
segment.target: On the Policy menu, select Commit.

segment.source: Persistent VM Setup Properties
segment.target: Persistent VM Setup Properties

segment.source: Property
segment.target: Property

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Run VM Setup
segment.target: Run VM Setup

segment.source: Select this check box to run a setup script the first time the MED-V workspace is run.
segment.target: Select this check box to run a setup script the first time the MED-V workspace is run.

segment.source: Script Editor
segment.target: Script Editor

segment.source: Click to configure the setup script.
segment.target: Click to configure the setup script.

segment.source: For more information, see How to Set Up Script Actions.
segment.target: For more information, see How to Set Up Script Actions.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This button is enabled only when Run VM Setup script is selected.
segment.target: This button is enabled only when Run VM Setup script is selected.

segment.source: Message displayed when script is running
segment.target: Message displayed when script is running

segment.source: A message to be displayed while the script is running.
segment.target: A message to be displayed while the script is running.

segment.source: If left blank, the default message is displayed.
segment.target: If left blank, the default message is displayed.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This field is enabled only when Run VM Setup script is checked.
segment.target: This field is enabled only when Run VM Setup script is checked.

segment.source: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a Revertible MED-V Workspace
segment.target: How to Configure the Virtual Machine Setup for a Revertible MED-V Workspace

segment.source: To configure the virtual machine setup for a revertible MED-V workspace
segment.target: To configure the virtual machine setup for a revertible MED-V workspace

segment.source: Click a revertible MED-V workspace to configure.
segment.target: Click a revertible MED-V workspace to configure.

segment.source: In the Revertible VM Setup section, configure the properties as described in the following table.
segment.target: In the Revertible VM Setup section, configure the properties as described in the following table.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The revertible VM setup properties are enabled only for a revertible MED-V workspace.
segment.target: The revertible VM setup properties are enabled only for a revertible MED-V workspace.

segment.source: On the Policy menu, select Commit.
segment.target: On the Policy menu, select Commit.

segment.source: Revertible VM Setup Properties
segment.target: Revertible VM Setup Properties

segment.source: Property
segment.target: Property

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Rename the VM based on the computer name pattern
segment.target: Rename the VM based on the computer name pattern

segment.source: Select this check box to assign a unique name to each computer using the MED-V workspace so that you can differentiate between multiple computers using the same MED-V workspace.
segment.target: Select this check box to assign a unique name to each computer using the MED-V workspace so that you can differentiate between multiple computers using the same MED-V workspace.

segment.source: For more information on configuring computer image names, see How to Configure VM Computer Name Pattern Properties.
segment.target: For more information on configuring computer image names, see How to Configure VM Computer Name Pattern Properties.
